content: दारु {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [दीर्यते दॄ-उण्] {@--1@} Tearing, rending. {@--2@} Liberal. {@--3@} Kind. --रुः {@--1@} A liberal or munificent man. {@--2@} A donor. {@--3@} An artist. --रु {%<ab>n.</ab>%} (said to be {%<ab>m.</ab>%} also) {@--1@} Wood, a piece of wood, timber. {@--2@} A block. {@--3@} A lever. {@--4@} A bolt. {@--5@} The pine or Devadāru tree. {@--6@} Ore. {@--7@} Brass.
